content.rendered:
On May 21, the district hosted a special reception to recognize and celebrate the dedicated staff members retiring during the 2024–2025 school year. We extend our heartfelt thanks for your years of service to the students, families, and schools.  Each retiree will have a personalized brick placed along the Pathway to Innovation at Saratoga Springs High School.

Congratulations to the following retirees:

  • Elizabeth Bellon, School Bus Driver
  • Glyn Chilton, Special Education Teacher
  • Robert Clarke, Head Custodian
  • Timothy Dickie, School Bus Driver
  • Kaile Doti, Elementary Math Teacher
  • Edward Esposito, School Monitor
  • Johanna Garrison, ENL Teacher
  • Jeffrey Halstead, Music Teacher
  • Tracy Massari, Social Studies Teacher
  • Lynne Mattison, Clerk
  • Donna Meers, School Bus Assistant
  • Brenda Roberts, Sr. Keyboard Specialist
  • Kari Roessner, Reading Teacher
  • Jane Rosati, Clerk
  • Kristen Surber, Art Teacher
  • Edward Vidnansky, Motor Vehicle Operator
  • Coleen Waterhouse, Occupational Therapist
  • Kate Winslow, Cook
